question: What are the benefits of Pandas over NumPy?

answers.text: Pandas provides integration with other libraries.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: NumPy array can be 1-dimensional or multidimensional.

answers.text: Pandas supports heterogeneous data whereas NumPy supports homogenous numerical data.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: NumPy also provides integration with other data science libraries.

answers.text: Pandas supports both one-dimensional and two-dimensional data structures.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The Pandas DataFrame can store columns of varying data types, while NumPy only supports numeric data types.

detailedSolution: The Pandas DataFrame can store columns of varying data types, while NumPy only supports numeric data types.
